original_text: Notwithstanding the land shall be divided by lot: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.
korean_text: 오직 그 땅을 제비 뽑아 나누어 그들의 조상 지파의 이름을 따라 얻게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Notwithstanding the land shall be divided by lot
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 땅은 제비뽑기로 나뉠 것이라

sentences.original_text: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers
